title: Table of Values - Construct Function Model

content.question: If a model is constructed to represent these data, which of the following best applies to this situation?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="y equals 20 open parentheses 2 over 3 close parentheses to the power of t"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mi>t</mi></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.5: Exponential Function Context and Data Modeling

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
